messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Bee! *SQUEAL* That is so freakin cool! So that s why our little counter took such a leap last week! Sec you must grab the pic of the Shinsengumi
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Bee!

*SQUEAL* That is so freakin' cool! So that's why our little counter took
such a leap last week!
Sec you must grab the pic of the Shinsengumi Mannequins for your latest
"project" for I have the perfect caption heh heh.
